meanings.definition: A person or thing that rushes.
meanings.sent1: The rushers quickly ran to catch the bus.
meanings.sent2: The crowd of rushers hurried to finish their work before the deadline.
meanings.sent3: The little rushers in the race were so eager to reach the finish line.
meanings.sent4: The river flowed like a group of rushers racing towards the ocean.
meanings.sent5: The ants moved like tiny rushers, carrying food back to their nest.

meanings.definition: A member of a group of fans who are enthusiastic about a particular TV show, movie, or music group.
meanings.sent1: The rushers of the band camped outside the concert venue for days.
meanings.sent2: The group of rushers cheered loudly at the sight of their favorite actor.
meanings.sent3: The rushers dressed up as their favorite characters for the fan convention.
meanings.sent4: The rushers' excitement was like a wave of energy filling the stadium.
meanings.sent5: The rushers' dedication to the show was unwavering, attending every event.
